Name: nya-alhajiyusufmuha
Author: Al Haji Yusuf Muhammad Kanyamula
Source: http://goodwordbooks.com/, Goodword Books, Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa

Translations.Text: Lemekeza dzina la Ambuye wako wapamwambamwamba
Amene adalenga zonse ndi kuzikonza bwinobwino
Amene adalamula tsogolo lawo ndi kuwatsogolera
Amene amameretsa msipu
Ndipo amausanduliza kukhala udzu ouma
Tidzakuphunzitsa kulakatula chivumbulutso chathu ndipo sudzaiwala
Kupatula chokhacho chimene Mulungu amafuna. Ndithudi Iye amadziwa chilichonse chooneka ndi chobisika
Ndipo Ife tidzakufupikitsira, m’njira yaifupi
Motero kumbutsa mwina chikumbutso chingawathandize
Chikumbutso chidzalandiridwa ndi iye amene amaopa Mulungu
Koma munthu wochimwa adzachisiya
Amene adzaponyedwa mu ng’anjo yamoto ndi kulawa ululu wake
Mmene iye sadzafa kapena kukhala ndi moyo
Zoonadi iye amene adziyeretsa adzakhala wopambana
Amene amakumbukira dzina la Ambuye wake ndipo amapemphera panthawi yake
Iyayi, koma inu mumasangalala ndi zinthu za m’moyo uno
Ndipo moyo umene uli nkudza ndi wabwino ndi wosatha
Ndithudi! Zonsezi zidalembedwa mu Mabuku akale a Mulungu
Mabuku a Abrahamu ndi Mose
Kodi wamva za chinthu chachikulu chimene chili nkudza
Nkhope zina, patsiku limeneli, zidzachititsidwa manyazi
Pogwira ntchito zotopetsa
Iwo adzalowa kumoto woyaka
Iwo adzapatsidwa madzi oti amwe kuchokera kuchitsime cha moto
Sadzakhala ndi chakudya china koma chiphe cha mtengo waminga
Chimene sichidzawapatsa thanzi kapena kuthetsa njala
Nkhope zina, pa tsikuli, zidzakhala zosangalala
Adzakondwa chifukwa cha ntchito zawo
Atakhala m’minda ya pamwamba
Kumene iwo sadzamva zoononga kapena za bodza
Mudzakhala kasupe wa madzi oyenda
Ndi mipando yonyamuka ya wofowofo
Ndi zikho zomwera zitaikidwa pambali pake
Ndi makushoni yoikidwa m’mizere
Ndi mikeka yoyalidwa bwino pansi pake
Kodi iwo saona mmene ngamira zidalengedwera
Ndi Kumwamba mmene kudakwezedwera
Ndi mapiri mmene adalengedwera mokhazikika
Ndi dziko mmene adalitambasulira
Motero akumbutse, chifukwa udindo wako ndi wowakumbutsa
Iwe sindiwe munthu wowakakamiza ayi
Kupatula iye Al Fajr	651 amene abwerera m’mbuyo ndi kuyamba kusakhulupirira
Motero Mulungu adzamulanga chilango chachikulu
Ndithudi onse adzabwerera kwa Ife
Ndipo, ndithudi, chiwerengero cha zochita zawo chidzakhala kwa Ife
Pali m’mbandakucha
Ndi pali usiku khumi
Pali chofanana ndi chosiyana
Pali usiku pamene uli nkutha
Ndithudi m’menemu muli umboni wokwanira kwa anthu a nzeru
Kodi iwe siudaone mmene Ambuye wako adakhaulitsira anthu a Aad
Amene anali atali atali ngati nsanamila zitali zitali
wolingana nawo amene sanalengedwepo padziko
Ndi anthu a Thamoud, amene ankakumba nyumba zawo m’miyala ya m’dambo
Ndi Farao, amene anali ndi zichiri
Amene anali kuphwanya malamulo paliponse m’dziko
Ndipo adachulukitsa chisokonezo
Motero Ambuye wako adabweretsa chilango chosiyana siyana chowawa pa iwo
Ndithudi Ambuye wako amaona
Ndipo nthawi zonse munthu, pamene Ambuye wake amuyesa pomukweza ndi kumuonetsera chifundo chake, iye amati: “Ambuye wanga wandilemekeza ine.”
Koma akamuyesa pomumana zinthu, iye amati: “Ambuye wanga ali kundizunza ine.”
Iyayi! Koma inu simuonetsa chifundo kwa ana a masiye
Ndi kuuzana kuti mudzidyetsa anthu osauka
Inu mumalanda chuma cha anthu opanda mphamvu chifukwa cha umbombo
Ndipo mumakonda chuma ndi mitima yanu yonse
Iyayi! Koma pamene dziko lidzasinjidwa kukhala ufa
Ndipo Ambuye wanu adzadza pamodzi ndi angelo ali pa mizere
Ndipo Gahena idzabweretsedwa pafupi patsikuli. Ndipo patsikuli munthu adzakumbukira. Koma, kodi chikumbumtima chake chidzamuthandiza motani
Iye adzanena kuti: “Kalanga ine! Ndikanakhala ndinali kuchita zabwino pamene ndinali ndi moyo.”
Motero patsikuli, palibe wina amene adzalanga monga momwe Iye adzalangire
Ndipo palibe wina amene adzamanga monga ngati momwe Iye adzamangire
oh! Iwe wokhutitsidwa
Bwerera kwa Ambuye wako mosangalala ndi Iye, ndi Iye mosangalala ndi iwe
Lowa m’gulu la akapolo anga wolemekezeka
Ndipo lowa mu Paradiso yanga
